lines.text: "You can take the bitch outta the ghetto, but you just can't take the bitch outta the ghetto!"
From Gary huh, let me tell you where I'm from. A little place called "fresh off a nigga's ass." You just made me homesick.
What kind of brother drives a Volvo, anyway?
Check it; this thing's got side-impact airbags.
I get in a wreck it's all good; straighter than straight.

I don't want to know if you gave Williams the motel. See, if you gave up the motel, I'd probably have to whack you. Instead, what I'm gonna do is let bygones be bygones. That's the whole problem here. No one wants to let go of the past. Well, I'm letting go of the past, Ricky, 'cause guys like you and me, we have to worry about the future. Am I right?
Didn't you go to school? You can't end a sentence with a preposition.
Oh. Then, uh, where your warrant at, motherfucker?
I'm so tired of the drama.
